frontmatter.title: Develop options without initial commitments
frontmatter.description: Don't rush to commit, especially when unknowns are present. Be prepared by developing best next steps.

frontmatter.title: Find commonalities and ask questions
frontmatter.description: Ask questions. Be interested in the commonalities.

frontmatter.title: Outdoor recreation is best natural escape
frontmatter.description: Nature is rejuvenating and a natural stress reliever. Make time for outdoor recreation as an escape.

frontmatter.title: Plan for contingencies
frontmatter.description: There will be interruptions ahead. Plan for likely scenarios and recognize it won't go as planned.

frontmatter.title: Make controllable plans
frontmatter.description: There's a lot out of our control. Make plans that don't depend upon perfection from others.

frontmatter.title: Overt positive experiences
frontmatter.description: Recognize frustration. Strive for better. Accept what is. Find the best in what is now. Overly communicate the positive. s

frontmatter.title: Stick to healthy habits at inflection points
frontmatter.description: Inflection points can be positive or negative. Stick to the good habits at times of change. Don't allow the changes to make it a negative inflection point. Develop a new positive trajectory.

frontmatter.title: Schedule flexibility is a luxury
frontmatter.description: Don't let it become a burden. Recognize the opportunities presented with schedule flexibility, and realize the value of time.

frontmatter.title: Work through physical pain
frontmatter.description: Get mind involved elsewhere. Approach it like the problem it is.

frontmatter.title: Prevent mistakes from compounding
frontmatter.description: Mistakes will happen. Acknowledge mistakes when they happen. Reassess and make better decisions going forward. Don't let mistakes compound. Recover quickly.
